programme.title: Dementia 13
programme.desc: A widow hatches a bold plan to get her hands on the inheritance, unaware that she is targeted by a murderer

programme.title: The Horror of Party Beach
programme.desc: Sea creatures created from radioactive sludge terrorize a beach community.

programme.title: Fangs of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A beautiful virgin inherits a castle, but when she arrives at it, she finds that the inhabitants include a strange nobleman and a bevy of beautiful women she suspects may be vampires.

programme.title: Doppelganger
programme.desc: A writer acquires a strange new roommate with a psychotic alter-ego that follows her wherever she goes.

programme.title: Horror Rises From The Tomb [Spanish-Language Version]
programme.desc: An ancient warlock's spirit posseses people and forces them to commit sacrifices

programme.title: Dominion: Prequel To The Exorcist
programme.desc: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa.

programme.title: Stripped to Kill
programme.desc: A female detective gets her cuffs out and goes undercover (and underdressed) at a strip club to snatch the killer of local strippers.

programme.title: Stripped To Kill II
programme.desc: A stripper (Maria Ford) thinks she is killing other strippers; her roommate (Karen Mayo-Chandler) and a policeman (Eb Lottimer) do not.

programme.title: Night Of The Werewolf [Spanish-Language Version]
programme.desc: An evil witch brings back to life the infamous murderer Elizabeth Bathory.

programme.title: Demon of Paradise
programme.desc: Fishing with dynamite in Hawaii drives a lizard-man out of the water to terrorize people.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: A small group of scientists and soldiers struggle to control the flesh-eating horror that walks the earth above.

programme.title: Creepshow III
programme.desc: This second sequel to Creepshow (1982) features five new tales of horror.

programme.title: Night of the Demons [VHS Vault]
programme.desc: On the night of Halloween, 10 teens decide to go to a party at an abandoned funeral parlor. BIG MISTAKE.

programme.title: Cockneys vs Zombies
programme.desc: A gang of bank robbers fight their way out of a zombie-infested London.
